Who: LEGACY, Quickstride, Rat Trap
Location: Outside the Black fortress

> Kup ducked when the shot hit the blackfortress and shielded Nightlight with
> his body in order to avoid her any damage. Then he left on the floor
> Nightlight and opened his com link to Rattrap, and the others outside "I'm
> heading towards the exit... Cover me, Nightlight is with me but she's... she
> is sedated...
>
> Then the old autobot took Nighlight and continue his trip towards the exit

"Acknowledged." Legacy's voice transmitted to Kup.

Even as Legacy spoke, the door of the Black Fortress, the frame and
the wall surrounding it began to smoke under the assault that massive
tank that was Legacy was bringing to bear against it!

Then with a loud crash the door and it's frame, rather than
vaporizing, fell to the ground in a long arc. Interestingly, the
specialized heat resistant armor that normally protected the walls and
doors of the fortress against the searing heat from the lava, now
allowed these same devices, much like a drawbridge over a moat, to
become a pathway over the lava and into the Black Fortress itself!

"Autobots." Legacy transmitted to the Autobots and Maximals, "I am
resuming my entry into the Black Fortress to assist Rodimus and
Tuscon. Kup, I would suggest you rendevous with me as soon as you're
able, the path behind me should be a safe egress."

"Rat Trap, Quickstride." Legacy's cold voice intoned, "You have the
option to accompany me if you desire." With that Legacy's lights came
on, illuminating the entrance he had just made as he began to go
inside.

Legacy's force shield sparked as it began to absorb blows from the
internal defences that the fortress tried to bring against him. So far
it was holding.

(TAG)

OOC: I got the okay from Airly to knock down the door and such woohoo!!. :)

Preston
